result.eng: The work is attributed to Leonardo da Vinci.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: b'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: b'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
